channel.title: UglyFeed
channel.description: The ugliest, funniest news you'll ever read!

item.title: Man Sues Himself and Wins!
item.description: A local man sued himself for emotional distress and won, causing confusion and laughter in the courtroom.

item.title: Cat Elected Mayor in Small Town
item.description: A cat named Whiskers has been elected mayor in a small town, with residents claiming he's doing a purr-fect job!

item.title: Invisible Art Exhibit Sells Out
item.description: An art exhibit featuring invisible paintings has sold out, leaving visitors questioning their eyesight and sanity.

item.title: World's Largest Pizza Delivered by Helicopter
item.description: A pizzeria delivered the world's largest pizza by helicopter, causing traffic chaos and hungry crowds.

item.title: Robot Runs for President
item.description: A robot named RoboBob has announced its candidacy for president, promising efficient governance and zero corruption.

item.title: Alien Abduction Insurance Payouts Skyrocket
item.description: Alien abduction insurance payouts have skyrocketed, with more people claiming extraterrestrial encounters than ever before.

item.title: World Record for Longest Burp Broken
item.description: A man has broken the world record for the longest burp, clocking in at an impressive 2 minutes and 12 seconds.

item.title: Giant Rubber Duck Causes Traffic Jam
item.description: A giant rubber duck being transported through a city caused a massive traffic jam and amused onlookers.

item.title: Banana Peel Slips Lead to Banana Ban
item.description: A city has banned bananas after a series of banana peel slips caused a public safety concern.

item.title: Man Marries His Refrigerator
item.description: A man has married his refrigerator in a bizarre ceremony, claiming it's the coolest relationship he's ever had.
